column4: Hmm, I have a thought.  Is there any way I can keep the graphical login but allow each of my users to have a different WM?
my son is used to GNOME, but I prefer KDE, for example
I'm not used to this graphical booting, I was a command-line guy
what on earth :) it's the computer that does everything in the booting, if you don't like it then shut your eyes :)
